name: Solo Flight (2024)
description:
You're a pilot who is the first member of the Advanced Aviation Force and are ready to start flying. However, a giant alien worm boss rudely destroys your home town. Now it's up to you only to take on the challenge of completing missions to restore your civilization before facing off with the beast itself.

Try out three unique game modes including shooter, ring flight and rescue mission that increase in difficulty and rewards. Use this to upgrade and unlock new aircraft that will help you on your journey.

Highly recommended to be played using the Xbox controller (more controller support coming soon), or using the keyboard.
